item.title: Bridge Constructor Studio coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC this summer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/bridge-constructor-studio-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-switch-and-pc-this-summer

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Includes virtual reality support.

Publisher Headup and developer ClockStone Studio will release sandbox game Bridge Constructor Studio for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG this summer, the companies announced. The PlayStation 5 version will support PlayStation VR2, the PlayStation 4 version will support PlayStation VR, and the PC version will support SteamVR.

Bridge Constructor Studio first launched for Quest 2 and Quest 3 on December 12, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Headup Games:

About

Get building today!

Bridge Constructor Studio is a must-have for fans of engineering puzzles and creative sandbox games. Whether you’re crafting a sturdy architectural masterpiece or experimenting with wild and unconventional designs—anything is possible!

As a bridge architect, bring your visions to life: Design your constructions in animated 3D mini-dioramas and start the simulation to watch as your creations are put to the ultimate stability test.

Back to the Roots

Bridge Constructor Studio is a classic bridge-building game where you can let your creativity run free with an intuitive building system, easy controls, no budget constraints, and optional challenges. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned bridge-building pro, there’s something for everyone!

Key Features

  • 70 Challenging Puzzles – Test your construction expertise with dozens of unique bridge-building puzzles across varied biomes. Seven different vehicles and multiple construction materials (wood, steel, cables, concrete pillars, and roadways) ensure each puzzle is a fresh and varied challenge.
  • Limitless Creativity – With no budget or material restrictions, you can freely experiment and design without limits. For an extra challenge, earn a special reward by keeping costs within a set budget while ensuring your bridge holds up under pressure!
  • Diverse Environments – Build bridges across five beautiful biomes, from skyscraper-filled cities to snowy canyons, lush green valleys, and more. The possibilities are endless with seven unique vehicles offering different physics and challenges! Construct ramps and loops for daring monster truck stunts, create sturdy steel bridges for heavy timber transporters, or use moving objects in levels to overcome obstacles with the off-road vehicle. A pizza delivery van, parcel service truck, vacation van, and city bus also join the fun!
  • Sharing is Caring – Let your friends and family experience Bridge Constructor Studio without wrecking your carefully crafted masterpieces. Create up to five player profiles, each with its own campaign progress!

Are you ready to push the limits of engineering? Start building today!

item.title: Survival horror first-person shooter Eternal Evil coming to PS5, Xbox Series on May 30
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/survival-horror-first-person-shooter-eternal-evil-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-on-may-30

  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

First released for PC in November 2022.

Publisher Axyos Games and developer Honor Games will release survival horror first-person shooter Eternal Evil for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on May 30, the companies announced.

Eternal Evil first launched for PC via Steam on November 1, 2022.

Here is an overview of the game, via Honor Games:

About

In Eternal Evil, you’ll immerse yourself in a blood-soaked world filled with relentless enemies, limited resources, and no forgiveness. Fight your way through the darkness using a realistic firearm system and a brutal physics-based damage model that lets you dismember enemies limb by limb.

Inspired by the golden age of survival horror, Eternal Evil puts you in control of a lone survivor trapped in a city overrun by the undead. Every hallway holds danger. Every bullet counts. Every second matters.

Key Features

  • True Survival–Horror – Classic gameplay: tight corridors, brutal difficulty, scarce resources, and no hand-holding.
  • Tactical Combat – Master realistic gunplay and physics-based dismemberment to survive against evolving threats.
  • Atmospheric Exploration – Solve puzzles and uncover secrets hidden across deeply immersive, interconnected locations.
  • Inventory and Resource Management – Manage limited ammo, healing, and tools as you fight your way through the infected streets.
  • Unforgiving Enemies – Face enemies that mutate, hunt, and overwhelm. Every encounter is a battle for your life.

item.title: Little Kitty, Big City coming to PS5, PS4 on May 9
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/little-kitty-big-city-coming-to-ps5-ps4-on-may-9

  • PS4
  • PS5

Currently available for Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC.

Double Dagger Studio will release open-world adventure game Little Kitty, Big City for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on May 9, the developer announced.

Little Kitty, Big City first launched for Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on May 9, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Double Dagger Studio:

About

In Little Kitty, Big City, players will help a little kitty who has lost its way in the big city. On the way home, this kitty will explore a colorful city, help fellow animal friends with various tasks and requests, and cause chaos the way only a cat can. Feeling particularly mischievous? Pay a visit to your nearby shopkeeper and ruin their day help rearrange their jars of jam. Other core quest lines may include: taking a nap in the sun, committing petty theft in the form of stealing a stranger’s bagel, knocking over fragile planters, and other various victimless cat crimes.

Will you make your way home or will you explore what the big city has to offer first? I mean, getting home is obviously your main priority. Obviously. Well, it’s one of your priorities. Maybe more of a guideline… It’s definitely on your To-Do list somewhere! But first? Exploration!

Key Features

  • Explore the city at your own pace in an open-world playground filled with surprises!
  • Make friends with a colorful cast of chatty animals.
  • Complete quests, help your animal friends, or cause a total ruckus. It’s up to you.
  • Customize your Kitty with a plethora of very adorable hats!
  • Take a nap in the sunshine.
  • Find a way home…?

item.title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 for Switch launches this summer in Asia with English language support
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/hyperdimension-neptunia-rebirth1-for-switch-launches-this-summer-in-asia-with-english-language-support

  • Switch

Physical edition pre-orders open on May 1.

eastasiasoft will release the Switch version of Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 both physically and digitally in Asia this summer, the publisher announced. It will include English and Traditional Chinese text, as well as English and Japanese voice-overs.

Physical edition will be available for pre-order via Play-Asia starting May 1 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET. Only 2,000 Limited Editions will be produced, which include the game, manual, soundtrack CD, art book, Joy-Con stickers, mini case, acrylic standees, and a numbered certificate in a collector’s box for $59.99. A $39.99 standard edition will also be available. (You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.)

The Switch versions of the Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth trilogy were originally planned to release in the west, but were cancelled after being informed the games “did not comply with Nintendo Guidelines.” The PlayStation 4 versions, however, are due out both physically and digitally in the west late in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via eastasiasoft:

About

In the world of Gamindustri, four goddesses known as CPUs battled for supremacy in the War of the Guardians. One of the CPUs—Neptune—was defeated by the others and banished from the heavens. In her fall from grace, her memories were lost, but a mysterious book reveals itself to Neptune with knowledge of all of Gaminudstri’s history. Joined by Compa, IF and the sentient book known as Histoire, Neptune embarks on an extraordinary journey across four different nations on a quest to save the entire world!

Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 is a remake of the series’ first entry, now with all prior extras included! Packed with fast-paced, turn-based RPG action, fourth-wall-breaking, trope-demolishing dialogue and more item, weapon and costume customization than you can shake a Lvl. 1 Stick at, Gamindustri is a world set on turning the concept of the JRPG on its head!

Key Features

  • Join Neptune and friends as they fight to save the world of Gamindustri!
  • Battle with up to three characters on the field and three more as support.
  • Use “Plans” to customize the game’s enemy difficulty, dungeon treasure and more!
  • Craft unique equipment imbued with one or more abilities.
  • Enjoy a wealth of prior downloadable content now included as extras!
